perturbation.original_text: If you do not make the extra payment within 60 days from the date we notify you of your share of the deficiency, the amount will be charged as an indebtedness against the contract with interest compounded at the rate of 5% per year.
perturbation.changed_text: If you do not make the extra payment within 15 days from the date we notify you of your share of the deficiency, the amount will be charged as an indebtedness against the contract with interest compounded at the rate of 5% per year.
perturbation.explanation: Reducing the payment period to 15 days may be considered an unreasonably short timeframe for policyholders to respond and make necessary payments, potentially conflicting with consumer protection laws that require fair and reasonable opportunity to address financial obligations.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Potential violation of state consumer protection laws regarding fair debt collection practices and reasonable notice periods.

perturbation.original_text: Each year, we will determine our divisible surplus. This contract’s share, if any, will be credited as a dividend. Since we do not expect this contract to contribute to divisible surplus, it is not expected that any dividends will be credited.
perturbation.changed_text: Each year, we will determine our divisible surplus. This contract’s share, if any, will be credited as a dividend. No dividends will be credited under any circumstances.
perturbation.explanation: Stating categorically that 'no dividends will be credited under any circumstances' despite the contract being eligible for dividends can contradict the policyholder's reasonable expectation of receiving dividends if a divisible surplus exists, potentially violating insurance regulations that require fair and equitable distribution of surplus.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Potential violation of state insurance regulations regarding the equitable distribution of divisible surplus and policyholder expectations.

perturbation.original_text: You may transfer ownership of this contract in accordance with our bylaws. Society membership rights and privileges cannot be transferred or assigned.
perturbation.changed_text: Ownership of this contract cannot be transferred under any circumstances. Society membership rights and privileges cannot be transferred or assigned.
perturbation.explanation: Completely prohibiting the transfer of ownership may contradict state laws that protect the policyholder's right to assign or transfer their contractual rights, representing an unreasonable restriction on the policyholder's property rights.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Potential violation of state laws regarding the assignability of contract rights and policyholder property rights.
